statements: DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE id = 5 AND user_id = 10
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'network' AND allocated_capacity < 100;
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'storage' AND allocated_capacity > 100;
DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE id = 100 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth > 1000 AND network_device_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Traffic_Patterns WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Resource_Allocation WHERE usage_status = 'inactive' AND allocated_bandwidth < 1000;
